mapper.select: SELECT b.member_id, b.gender, b.nickname, b.birth_date, b.introduction, b.manner_temperature, b.profile_image_url, c.status_id FROM meeting_participation_history a JOIN member b ON a.member_id = b.member_id JOIN user c ON b.member_id = c.user_id WHERE meeting_id = #{ meetingId } AND a.status_id = 2 AND c.status_id != 4

SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId, m.leader_id AS leaderId, m.place_id AS placeId, m.sport_id AS sportId, m.status_id AS statusId, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.meeting_content AS meetingContent, m.date, m.start_time AS startTime, m.end_time AS endTime, m.min_user AS minUser, m.max_user AS maxUser, m.gender, m.age_group AS ageGroup, m.level, m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress, m.latitude, m.longitude FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_participation_history p ON m.meeting_id = p.meeting_id WHERE p.member_id = #{userId} AND m.date < #{now}

SELECT m.meeting_id AS meetingId, m.leader_id AS leaderId, m.place_id AS placeId, m.sport_id AS sportId, m.status_id AS statusId, m.meeting_title AS meetingTitle, m.meeting_content AS meetingContent, m.date, m.start_time AS startTime, m.end_time AS endTime, m.min_user AS minUser, m.max_user AS maxUser, m.gender, m.age_group AS ageGroup, m.level, m.custom_place_address AS customPlaceAddress, m.latitude, m.longitude FROM meeting m JOIN meeting_participation_history p ON m.meeting_id = p.meeting_id WHERE p.member_id = #{userId} AND m.date >= #{now}
